name: Mictlán (D00C)
description:
Game for the Historically Accurate Game Jam 4, explore the nine levels of Mictlán in a journey to reach the Gods of Death and eternal rest.

Only the first level was made for the Jam so the online version and original downloadable files remain like that.

After the Jam i added the second level, which is included in the downloadable files named Mictlán[Platform]PostJam.zip.
